gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Nuggets 128, Grizzlies 103
gameRecap.excerpt: The Nuggets defeated the Grizzlies, 128-103. Nikola Jokic led the way with 29 points, 11 rebounds, and eight assists for the Nuggets, while Christian Braun added 17 points and five rebounds in the victory. Lamar Stevens tallied 19 points, four rebounds, and two assists for the Grizzlies in the losing effort. The Nuggets improve to 51-21, while the Grizzlies fall to 24-48.
